pageContext.claim: “Having been involved in the negotiations, to put it mildly, the number that OPEC+ is looking to cut is 20 Million Barrels a day, not the 10 Million that is generally being reported. If anything near this happens, and the World gets back to business from the Covid 19 disaster, the Energy Industry will be strong again, far faster than currently anticipated. Thank you to all of those who worked with me on getting this very big business back on track, in particular Russia and Saudi Arabia.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is mixing up who is doing what here. OPEC+ countries have agreed to cut production by roughly 10 million barrels per day. Additional oil producing countries — including the U.S. and Canada have agreed to cut the other the 10 million barrels of production.
